title: Values and Variables
description: In this chapter, you will learn about the data types that you can manipulate in a JavaScript program: numbers, strings, and other primitive types, as well as objects and arrays. You will see how to store these values in variables, how to convert values from one type to another, and how to combine values with operators.

courses.title: Variables
courses.description: Learn to work with JavaScript variables

courses.title: Numbers
courses.description: Find out what is special about numbers in JavaScript

courses.title: Array Basics
